sentences.sContent: ...information embroidered with colourful graphics and tied together by hypertext links.
sentences.sCn: …饰以彩色图表并用超文本链接组合在一起的信息。

phrases.pCn: 超文本标记语言；超文本置标语言

remMethod.val: hyper(高于) + text(文本) → 超文本

trans.tranOther: a way of writing computer documents that makes it possible to move from one document to another by  clicking  on words or pictures, especially on the Internet
